title: PJM capacity auction hits price cap again as region falls short of reliability target
description: While high prices were expected, the more consequential outcome is that PJM procured less capacity than required to meet its one-event-in-10-years reliability standard.
content: While high prices were expected, the more consequential outcome is that PJM procured less capacity than required to meet its one-event-in-10-years reliability standard.
